greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 0; for n > 1, a(n) = Product_{d|n, 1 < d < n} prime(A305788(d)-1).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences operating on GF(2)[X]-polynomials
program: (PARI) A305812(n) = if(1==n,0, my(m=1); fordiv(n,d,if((d>1)&&(d<n), m *= prime(A305788(d)-1))); (m)); \\ Needs also code from A305788.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 11 2018
